LanguageData.AA_AerofleetEyes.label: aerofleet hood
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetEyes.description: Two new eyes have appeared on [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, and the entirety of [PAWN_possessive] face has been surrounded by a gelatinous membrane.
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetEyes.stages.1.label: adapted
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetVacuoles.label: gas vacuole
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetVacuoles.description: An aggregate of hollow cylindrical structures called gas vesicles, this vacuole can be inflated and deflated with gas to provide buoyancy.
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetVacuoles.stages.0.label: internal itch
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetVacuoles.stages.1.label: adapted
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.label: aerofleet fuzz
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.description: A fuzzy, soft layer of short, thin hairs
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.stages.0.description: A fuzzy, soft layer of short, thin hairs
LanguageData.AA_AerofleetFuzz.stages.1.description: A fuzzy, soft layer of short, thin hairs. This fuzz has thickened a bit.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.label: animus vox snout
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.description: An adorable little snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, so cute!
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.0.label: bestial
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face has turned into a more bestial snout, like that of a feral fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is much more difficult, but eating is easier.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.1.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s face seems to be swelling, the nose and jaw pressing out and looking decidedly more like an animal's.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.2.label: new
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.2.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is more difficult, but eating is easier.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.3.description: A charming snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, making eating easier.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.3.label: adapted
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.4.label: paragon
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.stages.4.description: A sculpted and charming snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a fox. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, making eating easier, and the silver tongue is a good boost in social events.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxSnout.comps.0.tools.0.label: teeth
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxEar.description: A large and sensitive ear, normally belonging to a fox.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxEar.label: animus vox ear
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxEar.stages.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s ears are growing longer, developing a point at the peak. They're a little more sensitive.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxEar.stages.1.description: Big fuzzy triangles crown [PAWN_nameDef]'s head, pivoting and flicking back to every sound they sense. They're very sensitive, so please don't shout.
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxTail.label: animus vox tail
LanguageData.AA_AnimusVoxTail.description: A wonderfully fluffy fox tail drapes from [PAWN_nameDef]'s spine. Was that a small wag just then?
LanguageData.AA_EtherHelixienFace.label: slug face
LanguageData.AA_EtherHelixienFace.description: A slimy, tentacular visage now makes itself apparent over the entirety of [PAWN_nameDef]'s face. With stalk eyes and weird, moving mouth bits it's quite a sight!
LanguageData.AA_EtherHelixienFace.stages.1.label: adapted
LanguageData.AA_EtherHelixienTail.label: slug tail
LanguageData.AA_EtherHelixienTail.description: A slimy tail, it feels slippery and reeks of bile. Amazing!
LanguageData.AA_EtherSlimyLimb.label: slime
LanguageData.AA_EtherSlimyLimb.description: A layer of slime has spread over this limb that never seems to wash off no matter how hard [PAWN_nameDef] scrubs.
LanguageData.AA_EtherSlimyLimb.stages.0.description: There's a very thin layer of slime oozing out of the pores.
LanguageData.AA_EtherSlimyLimb.stages.1.description: The skin is covered in a very thin layer of slime.
LanguageData.AA_EtherSlimyLimb.stages.2.description: This skin has a sticky layer of slime.
LanguageData.AA_EtherSlimyLimb.stages.3.description: The slime layer is thick enough that it sometimes drips onto the ground.
LanguageData.AA_EtherSlimyLimb.stages.4.description: The slime layer is so thick that blades and bullets have difficult penetrating it.
